collection.name: The Mountain of Smiling Bodies
collection.openText: The smiling faces are eerie and full of sorrow.

specialTipSize.specialTip: When #0 employee working inside dies, its Qliphoth counter will be reduced.
When a wounded employee enters the Containment Unit, its Qliphoth counter will be decreased.
When the work result was bad, its Qliphoth counter will be reduced.
When 10 or more employees die inside the facility, the Qliphoth counter will be decreased. However, it did not recognize the death of employees who were disposed of as execution bullets.
When escaping, $0 is sensitive to corpses. When suppressing, it is recommended to make sure no one dies because of $0. If casualties do happen, try to keep $0 from the dead.
If $0‘s suppression has been not completed on the previous level of management, you must be very careful to prevent any deaths inside the section of $0.

After escaping, when $0 spawned other entities, it won’t be completely suppressed by simply reducing its HP to 0. $0 will only be suppressed by reducing its HP and removing all other spawned entities.
